title: Fix blank thinking blocks in Telegram watcher output
description:
The transcript watcher is detecting thinking blocks and sending them to Telegram even when not in verbose mode, but sending them as blank/empty messages. Need to:
- Ensure thinking blocks are only sent when channel is telegram-verbose
- Never send empty/blank messages to Telegram
- Check the process_line logic for the thinking block handling

actions.note: Added guard to skip empty, whitespace-only, and '(no content)' placeholder messages. The thinking block logic was already correct (only sends on telegram-verbose), but the text extraction was picking up the '(no content)' placeholder that Claude Code writes when a turn has only thinking/tool use.
